comment: shes very unorganized, but shes ready to help you pass. just do the work (theres a lot) and you should do well.

I want to give some context to the only other rating on here for Ms. Allred right now. She had to be away for the first couple weeks on medical leave, then had a family emergency. She isn't "super unorganized" I have taken her before and this isn't typical. Guest speakers add to the class. And, for the record, I don't think her voice is annoying.

shes super unorganized didnt give us a clear rubric, never sctuslly teaches. will have guest speakers so she doesnt have to teach. discussions are annoying. her voice is so annoying and is so hard to stay focused on with her boring voice.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects
